lines.text: [Sonic is rescuing Sally]
Yo, Sal. Were going to blow this pop stand.
[Sonic holds up a cup to disguise his voice as Dr. Robotnik]
Open Cell #54.
Voice print approved. Hand print unapproved.
Open up this cell or I'll rip out your electronic brain.
Hand print unnecessary, you are Robotnik.
I really... hate that hedgehog... I hate him... I HATE him!... HATE HIM! hate... hate... hate!... HAAAAAAAAAAAATE!
Trust me, Sal.
Oh, I hate when you say that.
[later]
Trust me, Sonic.

[sarcastically]
Oh, I hate when you say that.
[Sonic, Sally and Antoine are inside a cave and Antoine sees lots of yellow eyes and Antoine starts yelling]
Ant, put a sock in it!
My socks? What is wrong with my socks?
Am I cool or what?
You're what.

[Dr. Robotnik grabs Sonic]
Who are you?
Someone that you are going to learn to hate, Robutnik!
I already hate you!
I've been doing solo missions since I was 10.
Without Permission!
[Sally hits Sonic when he was trying to high five her and then he lands on the ground]
Yo Sal! What you put in the old cereal this morning?
Antoine, you are startin' to tick me off!
What? I'm not even wearing my watch.

[walks out of his hovercraft]
Do you have it?
But of course.
[pulls out the power ring from his backpack]

[walks up and then falls into a pit]
You little fool!
I am not the fuel! You are the fuel!
And what would you do with me?
I will bring you to the freedom fighters where you will stand a trial for your terrible crimes. I will become a large hero and win the hand of the princess.
A nice dream but dreams where ment to be
[Robotnik activates his rocket boots and flys out of the pit]
BROKEN!

[fires laser shots]
NOW GIVE ME THE POWER RING YOU STUPID LITTLE RODENT!

[grabs the power ring from Antoine]
NOW I SHALL UNCOVER IT'S SECRETS!
[Dulcy freezes Dr. Robotnik and the Swatbots with her ice breath attack and then saves Sonic]
Way past Dulce!
They need to chill.
[Dulcy laughs]
Yo, you bot-breaths lookin' for me? I'm the only one here.
Hedgehog Alert! Sector 7 Quadtion 5!
[Swat Bots fire lasers at Sonic]

[dodges every laser shot]
WOOH! What ever happened to hellos? Jelly and Jam time!
Sir Your Virtual Reality Shriek Bot is ready for flight testing. You oversized toad!
Excuse me! WHAT WAS THAT SNIVELY?
Oh I said key in your code sir!
These terrapod beasts are the final species to be robotizicized Snively. When they are done I will control every living thing on this planet!
Except for the freedom fighters, Sir.
I am aware of that Snively. YOU DON'T HAVE TO REMIND ME!
Big round guy finally let Sonic defeat him. Well don't celebrate too soon hedgehog! Now it's my turn.
[laughs]
AND I'M NOT ALONE!
[Sonic escapes from being sucked into the void]
Nice try Robuttnik! But you lose!
Hedgehog Alert! Hedgehog Alert! Surrender now!
I surrender, I surrender!

[pulls out a power ring from his backpack]
Just kiddin'!
Sonic, time travel violates the law of psyhics.
So does Dulcy's flying but that doesn't stop her.
Yo, Robuttnik! I got a little surprise you for you.
I don't like surprises hedgehog. Especially from you!
Sonic, were you when the brains were handed out?
Where are we?
Good question.
I try.
Greengo!
Antoine, it's bingo not greengo.
I don't know how or when. But you're going to crash and burn pal!
Oh my! I'm shaking in my boots.
The plan was no good. Period.
C'mon Sal, Dulce is right. Robuttnik is holdin' all the aces. We should have taken him down a long time ago before he took over!
Sonic, we were 5 years old.
So we were a way cool 5!
[Sonic and Sally are riding on Dulcy's back to the Floating Island]
Whaddya think Dulce?
Were real close now, I can feel it.
She has said that 20 times today.
I saw it.
You said that 20 times too.
So sue me, now it's 21.

[Dr. Robotnik makes a command to his robot]
Open the void.
Impressive don't you think? Be sure to give Naugus my reguards. He's the wizard who invented it and your new neighbor.
Safe journey your majesty!
You'll regret this Julian!

[King Acorn gets sucked into the void]
You'll reggggrrretttt this!
Sir?
Sorry, Snively! Only room for one!
[rockets away via escape pod]
You don't give me enough credit... Julian.
Switch to voice recognition mode. Block all outside users.
Voice recognition mode complete.
Why are we voice activiating, Uncle Julian?
"WE" aren't.
[grabs Snively by the collar]
Now, everything will answer to my voice. Do you know what that means, Snively?

[choking]
No, Uncle Julian.
It means... you call me SIR!
[throws him down]
...yes, sir.
Way past cool!
Have a dreadful day.
Activate all exterior hedgehog traps!
But I thought you wanted him to get in.
Yes! But we can't make too easy!
Juice Time!
Juice and Jam Time!
Torque Time!
Recall me from the void in 1 hour Robotnik! And should you have any thoughts of betrayal?
[turns Robotnik's head into a penguin head and then Snively laughs]
Very, very good Naugus!
Trust me Naugus, I carry no such thought.
I should think not!
[snips his finger and then Robotnik's head is turned back to normal]
Have I made my point?
Have a safe journey Naugus! Activating void.
[pulls a lever and then Naugus gets sucked into the void]
Snively disable all retrieval programs.
But sir didn't you just...?

[interrupts]
NOW!
Yes sir.
Rule number one Naugus never trust anyone! Especially me!
[repeated line]
Sacré bleu cheese!
Ya gotta admit one thing Sal. I am one Major Hedgehog Hunk.
